A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi.... about 70 minutes of a good Star Wars movie. 83 minutes of sloppy crapola. The main plots I really enjoyed\, visuals were stunning ( minus all the extra goofy cgi). Adam Driver\, Daisy Ridley\, Mark Hamill and John Boyega all turn in outstanding performances. The others..... ehhh drag the film down a lot. Poe’s character truly grates on my nerves. With some serious editing and a retooling of a few scenes it could/should have been excellent. However\, some of those misfires really submarine this installment. 5/10
